name: Banshee
description: Tortured spirit of an elven woman. Her wailing curse damages enemies and she can possess enemy units to control them.

abilities.name: Curse
abilities.description: Curses enemy units, causing them to miss on attacks.

abilities.name: Anti-magic Shell
abilities.description: Creates a shield that absorbs spell damage.

abilities.name: Possession
abilities.description: Takes control of an enemy unit, destroying the Banshee.

texts: I am the chill of the grave.
